entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as passing over his essay to Hermione and sinking back into his armchair, indicating that he is tired.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts. She is described as holding out her hands for their essays and checking various facts in reference books, indicating that she is responsible and diligent.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is the cat of Hagrid, a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being present in the common room with Harry and Hermione.

relationships.description: Harry passes over his essay to Hermione, indicating that she is helping him with his work.
Hermione checks various facts in the reference books strewn across the table, indicating that she is diligent and responsible.
